title: Hospitality Practical Skills Enhancement: Virtual Reality-Based Microlearning Design Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can explain three core principles for designing microlearning content in an iVR environment.
Learners demonstrate the ability to plan and storyboard VR-compatible microlearning modules within 5 minutes.
Learners implement iVR-microlearning scenarios to address social issues through PBL team projects.
Learners achieve over 80% proficiency in applying user experience optimization criteria when designing iVR learning interfaces in formative assessments.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
